divs: Sighting DetailsAs I was getting out of my car to open up the daycare that I work at, I happened to look up when I saw a silent star like object fly from the southwest toward where I was standing.I first thought it was a satellite because it was silent.I ruled out an aircraft because there was no sound.As my daughter and I watched, the object seemed to veer toward us for a few seconds.It continued toward the east out of view.I'am a private pilot and judged the object to be maybe a few thousand feet or higher.Everything that I've seen in this area has had a sound or was clearly a satellite or aircraft but I thought this was too low to be a satellite and the morning sun was coming up over the east which made the sky partially lit.I thought it was unusual that the light was so bright with no sound.Both my daughter and I watched for a few minutes before it was time to open up the center.My feeling was calm I was not alarmed in anyway,although my daughter got a little nervous.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Carson City
There were no other sightings in Carson City on or around February 29th 2008
Summary: Silent satellite like light was seen flying west to east.
